author: Opinion by Dr. Terence Kealey
title: South Korea listened to the experts
description: While the US and UK have suffered wide Covid-19 outbreaks and endured massive lockdowns, South Korea has avoided the worst by being prepared, learning from the past, and handling the outbreak adeptly, argues Dr. Terence Kealey of the Cato Institute
content: Dr. Terence Kealey is an adjunct scholar at the Cato Institute and a professor of clinical biochemistry at the University of Buckingham in the United Kingdom, where he served as vice chancellor until 2014. The opinions expressed in this commentary are his own… [+6817 chars]
